name: Rossyln Microflyers
about: Rosslyn MicroFlyers is a CAA accredited Flight School (CAA ATO 0228) located in Pretoria, South Africa, with an excellent safety record spanning over a decade. We offer initial training, conversions, and re-validation flight tests for microlight pilots. Our training program requires a minimum of 25 hours of flying, including 10 hours of dual and 15 hours of solo flight, and passing all exams with at least 75%. We ensure that all students undergo a medical examination and obtain a student license before commencing their training. Our active Flying Club, managed by an energetic committee, enhances the learning experience. Join us for an introductory flight to experience the freedom of flight, and let us guide you to become a safe and responsible pilot. Explore the vast skies of South Africa with Rosslyn MicroFlyers.
